Package de.stocker.common

Interface IStockItem

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    StockItem
    public interface IStockItem
    The Interface IStockItem is implemented by the stock item objects in the data base model and offers the methods to access all relevant data of the stock.
    Author:
    Matthias Rudolph

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      void addAlarm​(double threshold)
      Adds an alarm at the specified threshold.
      void addAlarm​(double threshold, java.awt.Color color)
      Adds an alarm alarm at the specified threshold with the specified color used to draw the alarm on the charts.
      void addStockListener​(IStockListener l)
      Adds a stock listener which gets notified when the stock data is updated
      void clearAlarms()
      Clears all alarms for this stock item.
      double[] getAlarms()
      Gets an array of all alarm thresholds for this stock item.
      java.util.Set<AlarmUnit> getAlarmUnits()
      Gets a set of all alarm unit objects for this stock item.

      Gets a Bollinger Band object for this stock item for the specified parameters.

      Gets an array of candle data.
      java.util.List<ChartCandle> getCandles​(EChartResolution chartResolution)
      Gets a list of chart candles containing the candle data for a specified resolution, default amount.

      Gets a list of a specified amount of chart candles containing the candle data for a specified resolution.

        boolean isLoading()
        Checks if stock item is loading data from the data provider.
        Returns:
        true, if stock item is loading data

        Sets the loading status.
        Parameters:

        Parameters:

        Notifies all stock listeners of an update in the stock data

      • updateStockFromPushData

        void updateStockFromPushData​(double price,
                             java.time.Instant instant,
                             TradeDataUnit[] pushData)
        Updates the stock item from push data. Used to update the current price, the time stamp and the candle data from an array of times-sales data
        Parameters:
        price - the new current price
        instant - the current instant
        pushData - the push data array containing times-sales data

      • updateStockFromPushData

        void updateStockFromPushData​(double price,
                             java.time.Instant instant,
                             TradeDataUnit pushData)
        Updates the stock item from push data. Used to update the current price, the time stamp and the candle data from a single times-sales data unit
        Parameters:
        price - the new current price
        instant - the current instant
        pushData - the push data containing a single times-sales data unit

      • hasCandles

        boolean hasCandles​(EChartResolution chartResolution)
        Checks if the stock item has the candle data for the specified resolution, default amount.
        Parameters:
        chartResolution - the chart resolution
        Returns:
        true, if stock item has the candle data

      • hasCandles

        boolean hasCandles​(EChartResolution chartResolution,
                   int amount)
        Checks if the stock item has the specified amount of candle data for the specified resolution.
        Parameters:
        chartResolution - the candle resolution
        amount - the amount of candles
        Returns:
        true, if stock item has the candle data

      • putCandleData

        candles - the list of candles

      • getBollingerBand

        BollingerBand getBollingerBand​(EChartResolution chartResolution,
                               double f,
                               int n)
        Gets a Bollinger Band object for this stock item for the specified parameters.
        Parameters:
        chartResolution - the chart resolution
        f - the standard deviation factor f
        n - n determines the period of the moving average used to calculate the Bollinger Bands
        Returns:
        the Bollinger Band object

      • getMovingAvg

        SimpleMovingAverage getMovingAvg​(EChartResolution chartResolution,
                                 int n)
        Gets a Simple Moving Average object for this stock item for the specified parameters.
        Parameters:
        chartResolution - the chart resolution
        n - determines the period for which to calculate the moving average
        Returns:
        the Simple Moving Average object

      • addAlarm

        void addAlarm​(double threshold)
        Adds an alarm at the specified threshold.
        Parameters:
        threshold - the threshold

      • addAlarm

        void addAlarm​(double threshold,
              java.awt.Color color)
        Adds an alarm alarm at the specified threshold with the specified color used to draw the alarm on the charts.
        Parameters:
        threshold - the threshold
        color - the color

      • getAlarms
